Description.Name: Mobile Headquarters
Description.Details: Not designed for combat, the Mobile Headquarters is one-stop-shop for battlefield command and control functions. Capable of providing ECM coverage to your units, increasing lance cohesion in combat, carrying a squad of battle armor into the fray, calling down strafing runs from allied aerospace fighters, and even calling down allied battle armor and turrets for combat surprises, the Mobile HQ does it all. However, this all comes at a cost. The Mobile HQ is slow, poorly armored, and essentially carries no weapons other than a single paltry laser. Still, if it is protected, the Mobile HQ can turn the tide of war. CARRIES BATTLE ARMOR AND TURRET AIRDROP BEACONS AND THE STRAFING RUN CALLDOWN BEACON! Wheeled: Fast in open ground, slow in rough terrain. Movement: 4/6 Hex: 120/180 Meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 125 30 Left 125 30 Right 125 30 Rear 125 30 Turret 125 30 Total 625 150
